changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'avoir un apercu simpl: This plugin allows you to have a quick and simple overview of your energy expenses
index.md.Il gere l'eau, le gaz et l'electricité s: It manages water, gas and electricity only and will provide you with a graph of expenditure / consumption items
index.md.Il vous donne aussi la tendance et les v: It also gives you the trend and the variations compared to the previous period (you can have in Period the Day, the week, the month or the year
index.md.N'oubliez pas d'activer le panel (deskto: Do not forget to activate the panel (desktop and mobile) of the plugin in the configuration of it
index.md.La configuration du plugin est très simp: The configuration of the plugin is very simple it will ask you just the living space (heated) of your accommodation (for the calculation of DPE
index.md.Vous pouvez faire autant d'équipement de: You can make as much counting equipment as you want
index.md.commande donnant la consommation instant: command giving the instantaneous consumption (attention the plugin is not able to calculate the daily consumption from the instantaneous
index.md.commande donnant la consommation journal: order giving the daily consumption (so it must return at 0 at 00h00
index.md.commande donnant la coût journaliere (do: order giving the daily cost (so it must return at 0 at 00:00) in €
index.md.indique d'ajouter au total de la consomm: indicates to add to the total consumption of this type of energy
index.md.a cocher pour effectuer le calcul de DPE: to tick to perform the calculation of DPE on this energy (note that if your heating energy is gas consumption must be in m3 for calculations of DPE
index.md.permet de renseigner manuellement sa con: allows to manually enter its consumption over a period
